@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2008 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Sebastian Werner (wpbasti) Fabian Jakobs (fjakobs) Christian Hagendorn (chris_schmidt) Adrian Olaru (adrianolaru) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The stack container puts its child widgets on top of each other and only the topmost widget is visible. This is used e.g. in the tab view widget. Which widget is visible can be controlled by using the {@link #getSelection} method. Example Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 


   var stack = new qx.ui.container.Stack();

   stack.add(new qx.ui.core.Widget().set({
    backgroundColor: "red"
   }));
   stack.add(new qx.ui.core.Widget().set({
    backgroundColor: "green"
   }));
   stack.add(new qx.ui.core.Widget().set({
    backgroundColor: "blue"
   }));

   stack.setSelection([stack.getChildren()[1]]);
   this.getRoot().add(stack);

This example creates an stack with three children. Only the selected "green" widget is visible. External Documentation Documentation of this widget in the qooxdoo manual.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the size of the widget depends on the selected child. When disabled (default) the size is configured to the largest child.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the field model value. Should also update the UI.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var|null} Updates the field with the new model value.
@param.description: Updates the field with the new model value.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{null|Error} Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).
@return.description:
Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the model value to its initial value. Should also update the UI.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a consistent and up-to-date model value. Note: returned value can also be a promise of type Promise<*|null>.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {var|null} The model value plain or as promise.
@return.description: The model value plain or as promise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of currently selected items. Note: The result is only a set of selected items, so the order can differ from the sequence in which the items were added.

@return.description: List of items.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the index position of the given widget if it is a child widget. Otherwise it returns -1. This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.Widget} the widget to query for
@param.description: the widget to query for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The index position or -1 when the given widget is no child of this layout.
@return.description: The index position or -1 when the given widget is no child of this layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a new child widget. The supported keys of the layout options map depend on the layout manager used to position the widget. The options are documented in the class documentation of each layout manager {@link qx.ui.layout}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} the widget to add.
@param.description: the widget to add.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.
@param.description: Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a child widget at the specified index This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} Widget to add
@param.description: Widget to add

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index, at which the widget will be inserted
@param.description: Index, at which the widget will be inserted

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.
@param.description: Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description

@return.description: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description

@param.name: @param

@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@return.name: @return

@return.body: {String} messageId
@return.description: messageId
